text: Tiago Fernando Penela Silva (born 28 March 2000) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for Vitória Guimarães B as a goalkeeper. ==Club career== Born in Seixal, Silva spent most of his youth career in the ranks of S.L. Benfica B, and concluded his development at Vitória SC. He signed a contract with the latter in October 2018, when he was named in their new under-23 team. On 18 May 2019 he made his debut for the already relegated reserve team on the final day of the LigaPro season, in a 2–2 draw at home to FC Porto B. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:People from Seixal Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:LigaPro players Category:Vitória S.C. B players
title: Tiago Silva (footballer, born 2000)
